mapper.select: SELECT MONTH(regdate) AS month, sum(pay) monthlySum, sum(revenue) monthlyRevenue FROM sales WHERE year(regdate) >= #{thisyear} AND year(regdate) < #{nextyear} GROUP BY month WITH ROLLUP
select count(*) cate_count, b.bcategory_name from big_category b, small_category s where b.bcategory_num = s.bcategory_num group by b.bcategory_num with rollup
select count(*) cnt, (select class_title from class_info cc where cc.class_num=ww.class_num) title from wishlist ww group by class_num order by cnt desc limit 0,9
